title: Web-Based Chemistry Concept Mastery: Interactive E-Learning Course in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level chemistry knowledge (atomic structure, chemical equations, periodic table)
context.additional_context: An integrated chemistry theory and experiment curriculum in a blended learning environment using personal devices, focusing on strengthening job competencies in chemistry through parallel online platforms and offline practical sessions

learning_goals: Learners can explain types and characteristics of chemical bonds with at least 80% accuracy
Through virtual lab simulations, learners can balance chemical equations with at least 70% accuracy
Learners can score at least 85 points on quizzes predicting elemental properties based on the periodic table
Learners demonstrate at least 90% competency in handling hazardous situations during chemical safety simulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
